page.title: 19GARDEN CENTRE, WYCHBOLD
page.content: In the village of{Wychbold}there is the privately owned{garden centre of {Webbs,}and covering 33 acres,it has much to offer the professional and amateur{gardener.}Where the limited company cannot offer the customer a service,it has leased land to concerns that can.Thus,one is able to obtain sheds,greenhouses and camping items as well as compost,trees,plants,seeds and aquatic equipment . Webbs also offer a landscaping service and have entered the new pastime of 'Pick-Your -Own' fruit.Webbs provide full time {employment}for 40 people and part time work for 30 others,all of whom live in the locality.Webbs also purchase items from the small supplier, so that many craftsmen have an outlet for their products.Not only does this company provide a sales centre but also a pleasant place to rest and relax.
